structure.unit: A KENTUCKY UNIFORM UNINCORPORATED NONPROFIT ASSOCIATION ACT

text.section: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2) of this section, the laws of this Commonwealth govern the operation in this state of all unincorporated nonprofit associations formed or operating in this Commonwealth.

Unless the governing principles specify a different jurisdiction, the law of the jurisdiction in which a foreign unincorporated nonprofit association has its principal place of activities governs the internal affairs of the association.

law.history: Created 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 42, effective June 24, 2015.
